content: Provide a list of 15 words that have 'graph' somewhere in them.

Sure, I can help with that! Here are 15 words that contain "graph" somewhere in them:

1. Autograph - a person's own handwritten signature.

2. Biography - an account of a person's life written by someone else.

3. Paragraph - a distinct section of a piece of writing, usually dealing with a single theme or idea.

4. Graphic - relating to drawing or painting; or involving vivid description.

5. Photograph - a picture produced by using a camera.

6. Telegraph - a system for transmitting messages over a distance by means of an electrical cable.

7. Graphite - a soft, black, lustrous, crystalline form of carbon, used in pencils, among other things.

8. Choreograph - to plan and direct the dance steps and movements in a theatrical production.

9. Calligraphy - the art of producing decorative handwriting or lettering with a pen or brush.

10. Holograph - a document written entirely in the handwriting of the person whose signature it bears.

11. Lithograph - a print made from a drawing on a stone or metal plate.

12. Phonograph - an early device for recording and reproducing sound.

13. Seismograph - an instrument that measures and records vibrations in the earth, especially earthquakes.

14. Thermograph - an instrument that records temperature variations.

15. Topography - the arrangement of the natural and artificial physical features of an area.

I hope this list helps you! If you need any more information or have other questions, feel free to ask.
